synopsis.text: Unaired action unfolds in the special episode 12.5 of Ookiku Furikabutte ~Natsu no Taikai Hen~, available on the 7th DVD & Blu-ray volume! Originally unadapted from the manga, this episode bridges the gap between episodes 12 and 13 of the TV series. Kurata, a player from Bijyou, grapples with guilt after aggressively overpowering his opponents. When Abe is accidentally injured, Kurata is deeply affected and decides to distance himself from Roka's underhanded tactics. Don't miss out on this essential addition to the series!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
